video.title: Conviction
video.synopsis: Five young assistant district attorneys struggle with overwhelming caseloads and complex personal situations in this drama series.

episodes.synopsis: When an assistant district attorney is murdered, the evidence points to another ADA as a possible suspect. Meanwhile, Christina Finn loses crucial evidence related to her case, and Nick Potter joins the DA's office.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Peluso looks into a high school hate crime committed against a gay man, Rossi encourages a prostitute to testify against a rapist, and Steele puts a 14-year-old boy who killed his brother on trial as an adult.
episodes.title: Denial

episodes.synopsis: Chief Cabot begins a campaign against drugs after one of Potter's friends becomes entangled with cocaine, and Finn tries to get to the truth when an autopsy reveals that a girl who committed suicide did not have cancer as her mother had claimed.
episodes.title: Breakup

episodes.synopsis: Rossi puts an abusive husband on trial as her own mother struggles with domestic violence, Desmond prosecutes a popular music producer for murder, and Finn lands a case involving a diplomat's son busted at a strip club.
episodes.title: Indebted

episodes.synopsis: Over his boss's objections, Potter refuses to settle an important case, and Finn takes on a disturbing case involving a shaken baby. Meanwhile, Desmond gets intimate with a colleague, and Steele breaks off a date with Rossi.
episodes.title: Savasana

episodes.synopsis: Potter blows it when he subs for Desmond on a simple bail reduction, Rossi confronts a family when a deaf girl's boyfriend stabs her father, and Desmond puts in time working at a psychiatric hospital.
episodes.title: Madness

episodes.synopsis: Rossi takes on a case involving a model who claims she was raped, Steele investigates the death of a gay man's partner, Potter gets pistol-whipped after encouraging a witness to testify, and Finn is attracted to one of her witnesses.
episodes.title: True Love

episodes.synopsis: Finn takes on a dispute between a tenant and a landlord, Rossi tries a case involving insurance fraud, and Potter eagerly accepts a case he thinks will be a slam dunk, only to find out a priest wants to drop the charges.
episodes.title: Downhill

episodes.synopsis: Peluso gets no cooperation from the police when he prosecutes a cop killer, Steele and Desmond struggle to get to the truth in the death of a teenager, and Finn and Potter must attend acting classes to improve their performance in court.
episodes.title: The Wall

episodes.synopsis: When a renowned attorney is accused of killing her husband, she elects to defend herself in court. The case falls to Steele, who finds that prosecuting the case against the gifted lawyer is tougher than he expected.
episodes.title: Deliverance

episodes.synopsis: Potter botches a slam-dunk drug case he takes over from Rossi, a wealthy couple and a fortune-teller factor into Desmond's assignment, and Steele's case against a rapist founders when the victim's father interferes. Meanwhile, Finn and Peluso flirt.
episodes.title: Indiscretion

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is found murdered, the evidence points to employees of a bar she had visited earlier that evening. During the trial, the suspects take several members of the DA's office hostage in a desperate attempt to negotiate an escape.
episodes.title: 180.80/Hostage
